Bsp_VidSensorFeatures Struct Reference
External Device Interface API » External Camera Sensor API

#include <bsp_videoSensor.h>

Detailed Description

Structure describing features/capabitlity of sensor.

Field Documentation

UInt32 Bsp_VidSensorFeatures::activePixelH

Active pixels in Horizontal direction

UInt32 Bsp_VidSensorFeatures::activePixelV

Active pixels in Vertical direction

UInt32 Bsp_VidSensorFeatures::bayerPattern

Output color pattern for the sensor

UInt32 Bsp_VidSensorFeatures::chipId

Chip ID

UInt32 Bsp_VidSensorFeatures::chipRevision

Chip Reivision

UInt32 Bsp_VidSensorFeatures::firmwareVersion

Firmware revision number

UInt32 Bsp_VidSensorFeatures::isDccCfgSupported

Flag to indicate whether sensor driver DCC configuration, Based on this GET_DCC_PARAMS ioclt can be called.

UInt32 Bsp_VidSensorFeatures::isEepromDataSupported

Whether sensor supports Eeprom data or not

UInt32 Bsp_VidSensorFeatures::isEmbededDataSupported

Whether sensor supports Embedded data or not

UInt32 Bsp_VidSensorFeatures::isFlipSupported

Whether sensor supports horizontal or vertical or both flip ioctl IOCTL_BSP_VID_SENSOR_SET_FLIP_PARAMS can be used only if this flag is set to TRUE

UInt32 Bsp_VidSensorFeatures::isManualAnalogGainSupported

Whether sensor supports manual analog gain contiguration or not

UInt32 Bsp_VidSensorFeatures::isManualExposureSupported

Whether sensor supports manual exposure configuration data or not ioctl IOCTL_BSP_VID_SENSOR_SET_EXP_PARAMS can be used only if this flag is set to TRUE

UInt32 Bsp_VidSensorFeatures::isOnePassWdrSupported

Flag to indicated if sensor driver supports one pass wdr or not, This flag can be TRUE only after isWdrModeSupported is set to TRUE

UInt32 Bsp_VidSensorFeatures::isSetCfgSupported

Wether or not SET_CONFIG ioctl supported

UInt32 Bsp_VidSensorFeatures::isSoftStandbySupported

This parameter shows whether sensor can be stopped durring operation (enter in software standby)

UInt32 Bsp_VidSensorFeatures::isWdrModeSupported

Whether sensor WDR merged output or not, ioctls IOCTL_BSP_VID_SENSOR_SET_WDR_PARAMS and IOCTL_BSP_VID_SENSOR_GET_EXP_RATIO_PARAMS can be used only if this flag is set to TRUE

UInt32 Bsp_VidSensorFeatures::sensorId

Unique ID of the sensor for differnt types use Bsp_VidSensorId enum
